page.title: 16Green grocers
page.content: Every Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday Deans dad has to get up at 2.30am and leaves for market. He goes to Spitalfields. He is a green grocer and works five days a week. On Monday he goes to Countyware house to buy sweets for his round. He drives a mobile shop. He closes his shop at 5pm or 5.30pm. He has two days off each week. he can't wait until Sunday and Monday. He has five staff in the shop not including himself. In his spare time he likes to watch football and organise the under 12's team.
